Package com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude.batch

Class BatchWriter.SOAPWriter

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude.batch.BatchWriter.SOAPWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
Enclosing class:
BatchWriter
protected class BatchWriter.SOAPWriter extends ByteArrayOutputStream
SOAPWriter uses a SOAPMessage prototype to add temporary content to its SOAPBodyElement using the addChildElement(javax.xml.namespace.QName) method which adds elements to the body of this message tat can be appended to the BatchWriter's file using the writeAppendedElement() method.

This class that can also be seen as a stream, updates and appends conten to this BatchWriter's file by directly accessing this BatchWriter's RandomAccessFile.

Note: after creating this stream and befora accessing any of its methods it is required to call its init() method which initializes certain critical properties.

Since:
1.0
Version:
2024.12.27
Author:
Beto Lopez

      public void writeComment(String text) throws jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException, IOException
